鴝.definition: (bound form, used in the names of various kinds of bird, esp. robins and redstarts)

鴝姬鶲.definition: (bird species of China) mugimaki flycatcher (Ficedula mugimaki)

鴝岩鷚.definition: (bird species of China) robin accentor (Prunella rubeculoides)

鴝蝗鶯.definition: (bird species of China) Savi's warbler (Locustella luscinioides)
